attributes.action: Fine people parking in an allocated parent and children space without a child
attributes.additional_details: As a mom of two on numerous occasions have witness people without children using the spaces that are allocated for people with children. They are allocated as they have additional space to enable us to get children in and out of the car safely. People are taking advantage of the spaces as they are normally closer than standard spaces. They are provides for the safety of our children and I feel to apply the same fine as using a disability space would reduce the amount of times this is happening.
attributes.background: Give the same rules to people parking in an allocated parent and child spaces as that you receive parking in a disability allocated space

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631832
